info.name: Stylay API
info.description: API for Stylay - Multi-vendor E-commerce Platform

request.description: Register a new user account
Log in with email and password
Logout and invalidate the user's session
Assign roles to a user (Admin only)
Remove roles from a user (Admin only)
Get all roles (Admin only)
Get a specific role by ID (Admin only)
Create a new role (Admin only)
Update a role (Admin only)
Delete a role (Admin only)

body.raw:
{
    "first_name": "Vendor",
    "last_name": "One",
    "email": "vendor1@example.com",
    "phone": "+2348012345678",
    "business_name": "Vendor One Store",
    "cac_number": "RC123456",
    "instagram_handle": "vendorone",
    "facebook_handle": "vendorone",
    "twitter_handle": "vendorone",
    "join_reason": "I want to sell my products on your platform"
}

request.description: Register a new vendor account
Get the authenticated vendor's profile

formdata.value: A great store with amazing products

request.description:
Complete vendor onboarding with file uploads.

**Notes:**
- Logo: Single image file (max 2MB, jpg/png/webp)
- Business Images: Multiple files (max 10, 5MB each, jpg/png/webp)
- All other fields are required text fields

**Folder Structure:**
- Logos: `uploads/stores/{userId}/logo/`
- Business Images: `uploads/stores/{userId}/business-images/{date}/`
Get all vendors with pagination and filtering
Get vendor details by ID
Approve a vendor (Admin only)
Reject a vendor with a reason (Admin only)

item.name: Customer Follower Endpoints
item.description: Endpoints for customers to manage vendor following

request.description: Follow a vendor (Authenticated users only)
Unfollow a vendor (Authenticated users only)
Check if current user is following a specific vendor (Authenticated users only)
Get list of vendors followed by current user (Authenticated users only)
Get list of vendors followed by a specific user (Authenticated users only)
Get list of users following a vendor (Any authenticated user)
Retrieve all categories with optional pagination and filtering
Retrieve categories in a hierarchical tree structure
Retrieve a specific category by ID
Retrieve products associated with a specific category
Create a new category (Admin only)
Update an existing category (Admin only)
Delete a category (Admin only)

item.name: Product Analytics
item.description: Product impression and viewer metrics endpoints

request.description: Get detailed analytics for a specific product including impressions, viewers, sales data, conversion rate, and monthly trends. (Vendor/Admin only)
Get comprehensive analytics summary for all vendor products including total impressions, viewers, sales, and top performing products. (Vendor only)
Get detailed analytics for any product including impressions, sales data, conversion rate, and monthly trends. (Admin only - can view any product's analytics)
Create a new supply record and update inventory
Create multiple supply records in bulk
Get all supply records
Get inventory details for a specific product
Update inventory stock level for a product
Get list of products with low stock levels
Get inventory adjustment history for a product
Get all inventory across all vendors (Admin only)
Get inventory for a specific vendor (Admin only)
Get low stock items across all vendors (Admin only)
Get inventory history across all products with filters (Admin only)
Get all supplies across all vendors (Admin only)
Get supplies for a specific vendor (Admin only)
Get supply history for a specific product (Admin only)
Get supply summary and analytics (Admin only)
